sentences.sContent: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.sCn: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.sContent: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
...I was making as much money as I was as an accountant...
...The Shoppers in the UK are spending less money on toilet paper to save money...
...the gift money must be put in the red envelope instead of the white envelope...
...The next largest amount of public money goes to teach and train our citizens...
...Liechtenstein uses the same money as its neighbor Switzerland...
...they often put money in red envelopes...
...Years ago the government made money by selling public lands...
...When people give money as gift to families or closed friends...
...It's not about making money for this former elementary school teacher...
...I knew then that as soon as I had enough money to get my own business going...

phrases.pCn: 游资，（为追求高额利润而流动的）短期流动资金
价内；赌胜；获奖；富裕；赚钱
[俚语](赛马时)下大赌注于最有希望获胜的马

words.tran: 货币主义的；以货币为基础的
[金融] 货币化；定为货币；货币铸造
定为货币，使成为合法货币；铸造成货币
使货币化；把…定位法定货币（等于monetize）

trans.tranOther: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank
